title: What does it mean to be awake in the pursuit of initiation?
first_phrase: In this segment, the author emphasizes the importance of a "way of being" that leads to awakening, which is the key to all perceptions of faith. The author states that understanding the "cardinal points" is crucial when embarking on an unknown path. They also highlight the need to correct misconceptions about esoteric ways and redirect mental orientation. This work is important in a time of confusion and fraud, particularly in esotericism.
